title: Anticipation-Led Selfishness
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Rin, can you cheer up already? You’re ruining your cute face, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>....But you said you’ll watch my dance practice, Eli-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Of course I will. As soon as I’m done with this student council work. So can you wait just a little bit more?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Uuu, Rin was really looking forward practicing with you today nya, Eli-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Me too. That’s why I have to hurry up and finish this work so we can practice together, Rin. I’ll be done in 10 minutes or so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>....Okay nya. Rin is going to wait.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thank you, I’ll get it done quickly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>....Rin is sorry for being selfish even though you have important work to do, Eli-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, this is not enough to be called selfish, okay? Alright, let’s get this over with!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then Rin will cheer you on so you can do your best nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
